snippet: Judge Wendell Griffen of Pulaski County Circuit Court on Friday halted the executions of eight inmates, a blow to the state’s efforts to begin putting prisoners to death for the first time in a decade.
abstract: Arkansas Judge Wendell Griffen puts stop to executions of eight inmates, stalling state's efforts to begin putting prisoners to death for first time in decade.
lead_paragraph: Judge Wendell Griffen of Pulaski County Circuit Court on Friday halted the executions of eight inmates, a blow to the state’s efforts to begin putting prisoners to death for the first time in a decade.
